mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservations ( user_code, car_code, rental_location, rental_date, rental_time, return_location, return_date, return_time, insurance_type, payment_category, payment_type, payment_amount ) VALUES ( #{userCode}, #{carCode}, (SELECT branch_code FROM branchs b WHERE branch_name = #{rentalLocation}), #{rentalDate}, #{rentalTime}, (SELECT branch_code FROM branchs b WHERE branch_name = #{returnLocation}), #{returnDate}, #{returnTime}, #{insuranceType}, #{paymentCategory}, #{paymentType}, #{paymentAmount} );
